info.description: This is a sample server Petstore server via JSON.
info.title: Swagger Petstore (JSON)

get.description: pathstest25 - non parameterized paths that vary only in trailing slash (/pathstest25) - invalid
pathstest25 - non parameterized paths that vary only in trailing slash (/pathstest25/) - invalid
pathstest26 - parameterized paths that vary only in trailing slash (/pathstest26/{var}) - invalid
pathstest26 - parameterized paths that vary only in trailing slash (/pathstest26/{var}/) - invalid
pathstest27 - parameterized paths that vary only in formal parameter names (/pathstest27/{var1}) - See: OAS 3 - Path Template Matching - invalid
pathstest27 - parameterized paths that vary only in formal parameter names (/pathstest27/{var2}) - See: OAS 3 - Path Template Matching - invalid
